vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.15;
son of: Caleb (H3612);
brother of: Achsah (H5915), Iru (H5900) and Elah (H0425J)
§ Naam = "pleasantness"
one of the sons of Caleb and grandson of Jephunneh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿安 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "喜樂"
迦勒的眾子之一, 耶孚尼的孫子 #書 19:27|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿安 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "喜乐"
迦勒的众子之一, 耶孚尼的孙子 #书 19:27|
